description:
Contents:
 - Town Furs: White "Casual clothing for an outing that is made from the fur of beasts."
 - Kid's Town Furs: White "Casual kid's clothing for an outing that is made from the fur of beasts."
*You can buy it at any time in the game shop (Clothing Store in Castle St.) when you purchase it.
 - Fur Beret: White "A warm beret made from the fur of beasts."
*You can buy it at any time in the game shop (Fashion Store in Castle St.) when you purchase it.
name: Town Furs Set ( White )
